edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.blackjack

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.blackjack.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player Class has the following: Hand, String name, and a boolean for busting.
    Version:
    2014.02.27
    Author:
    Brian Wan, Fanny Kuang, Eric Palyan

      • isNotBust

        public boolean isNotBust()
        returns false if player went bust. checks both hands if split.
        Returns:
        boolean if busted in both hands (for split)

      • hasBlackjack

        public boolean hasBlackjack()
        returns if player has blackjack. checks both hands if split.
        Returns:
        boolean if blackjack in either hand
